Yubikey.title: Yubikey Project
Yubikey.flavorText: A short description of the aforementioned project
description: Website made in angular to rank films side by side until
an order is established from most-liked to least-liked films.
Made by request of T.P.

Multio.title: Mult.io
description: An Android app that lets users test out their mathematical prowess.
Your score is based on how quickly and accurately you solve different math equations.

Tumble.title: Tumble
description: A webscraper that retreives data from individual Tumblr blogs and send subscribers
a Discord message when new posts are found and how many new posts have been made.
